objects.specification: A neutral beige tone floor panel with a smooth matte finish, a flat slab measuring six meters by six meters and minimal thickness, designed to serve as the base of the fair booth.
A smooth light gray matte wall segment with a subtle plaster texture, standing three meters high and with a slim profile, forming the rear enclosure of the booth.
A smooth light gray matte wall segment with a subtle plaster texture, standing three meters high and with a slim profile, forming the left enclosure of the booth.
A smooth light gray matte wall segment with a subtle plaster texture, standing three meters high and with a slim profile, forming the right enclosure of the booth.
A smooth light gray matte wall segment with a subtle plaster texture, standing three meters high with a slim profile, forming the left portion of the front entrance.
A smooth light gray matte wall segment with a subtle plaster texture, standing three meters high with a slim profile, forming the right portion of the front entrance.
A curved reception desk with a clean white finish, standing at 1.1 meters tall and spanning two meters wide, featuring a smooth curved facade and minimal modern detailing for greeting visitors.
A lightweight vertical rectangular fabric banner made of matte polypropylene, two meters tall and half a meter wide, tensioned for a flat display surface.
A lightweight vertical rectangular fabric banner made of matte polypropylene, two meters tall and half a meter wide, tensioned for a flat display surface.
A lightweight vertical rectangular fabric banner made of matte polypropylene, two meters tall and half a meter wide, tensioned for a flat display surface.
A high round standing table with a polished dark wood finish, 0.8 meters in diameter and 1.1 meters tall, featuring a cylindrical central support and circular top for informal meetings.
A high round standing table with a polished dark wood finish, 0.8 meters in diameter and 1.1 meters tall, featuring a cylindrical central support and circular top for informal meetings.
A bar stool with a round cushioned seat, 0.7 meters tall, featuring a single central metal support with integrated footrest and a round base.
A bar stool with a round cushioned seat, 0.7 meters tall, featuring a single central metal support with integrated footrest and a round base.
A bar stool with a round cushioned seat, 0.7 meters tall, featuring a single central metal support with integrated footrest and a round base.
A bar stool with a round cushioned seat, 0.7 meters tall, featuring a single central metal support with integrated footrest and a round base.
A bar stool with a round cushioned seat, 0.7 meters tall, featuring a single central metal support with integrated footrest and a round base.
A bar stool with a round cushioned seat, 0.7 meters tall, featuring a single central metal support with integrated footrest and a round base.
A product display counter with a three-meter wide base and 0.8-meter depth, one meter tall, featuring glass display cases on top of a solid plinth and integrated LED accent lighting.
A slender cylindrical spotlight fixture in warm yellow, with a thin elongated body hanging from the ceiling, designed to cast focused warm light over the display counter.
A slender cylindrical spotlight fixture in warm yellow, with a thin elongated body hanging from the ceiling, designed to cast focused warm light over the display counter.
A potted indoor plant approximately one meter tall, featuring lush green foliage in a decorative planter pot, with leaves showing natural texture and organic branching.
A glossy latex balloon sphere of 0.3 meters diameter, inflated and floating at two meters high, tied with a thin string and finished in vibrant color.
A glossy latex balloon sphere of 0.3 meters diameter, inflated and floating at two meters high, tied with a thin string and finished in vibrant color.
